speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: SCENE II. A field between the two camps.

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Alarum within. Enter, with drum and colours,  KING LEAR, CORDELIA, and Soldiers, over the stage; and exeunt

speaker: EDGAR
text_entry: Here, father, take the shadow of this tree

speaker: EDGAR
text_entry: For your good host; pray that the right may thrive:

speaker: EDGAR
text_entry: If ever I return to you again,

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: Alarum and retreat within. Re-enter EDGAR

speaker: EDGAR
text_entry: Away, old man; give me thy hand; away!

speaker: EDGAR
text_entry: King Lear hath lost, he and his daughter ta'en:

speaker: EDGAR
text_entry: Give me thy hand; come on.

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text_entry: No farther, sir; a man may rot even here.

speaker: EDGAR
text_entry: What, in ill thoughts again? Men must endure

speaker: EDGAR
text_entry: Their going hence, even as their coming hither;
